text: Hagi ana vahe'mo'za tamagri hozafima mene'a kave'ene, nontamifima me'nea kavera eme ne'za eri hana nehu'za, mofavre naga'mokizmi ne'zanena eme ne'za eri hana hugahaze. Ana nehu'za sipisipine bulimakao afutaminena zamahe'za nevaga nere'za, grepi ragane fiki raganena tagi'za nevaga nere'za, hankave vihu keginama hu kagi'naza kumapi frakita tagu vazigahunema nehaza kuma'enena bainati kazinteti ha' eme huramante'za eri haviza hugahaze.
